message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_ACTIVESUSPENDEDCASES_ONLY
message.locale: Payments can only be generated on active, suspended or pending closure cases.

message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_ACTIVEPENDINGCLOSURECASES_ONLY
message.locale: Payments can only be generated on active or pending closure cases.

message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_BENEFITPRODUCTS_ONLY
message.locale: Payments can only be issued on benefit products.

message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_NOT_DUE_TODAY
message.locale: There is no payment due on this case today.

message.name: INF_GENPAYMENT_QUEUED_FOR_GENERATION
message.locale: Payment has been queued for payment generation.

message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_INVALID_DELMTHD
message.locale: Only Cash, Check & Voucher payments can be generated online.
Only Cash, Cheque & Voucher payments can be generated online.

message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_ACTIVESUSPENDEDCLOSEDCASES_ONLY
message.locale: Payments can only be generated on active, suspended, closed or pending closure cases.

message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_ACTIVECLOSEDCASES_ONLY
message.locale: Payments can only be generated on active, closed or pending closure cases.

message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_ACTIVENONEXPIREDADDRESS_ONLY
message.locale: The payment cannot be generated as there is no active address for the nominee.

message.name: ERR_GENPAYMENT_ACTIVENONEXPIREDBANKACC_ONLY
message.locale: The payment cannot be generated as there is no active bank account for the nominee.
